entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
